15 #define RAMSIZE 65536
16 #define ROMSIZE 16384

31 class TED : public MemoryHandler {
32  public:
33  TED();
34  ~TED();
35  KEYS *keys;
36  TAP *tap;
37  virtual void UpdateSerialState(unsigned char portval);
38  virtual void Reset();
39  // read memory through memory decoder
40  virtual unsigned char Read(unsigned int addr);
41  virtual void Write(unsigned int addr, unsigned char value);
42  // read memory directly
43  unsigned char readDMA(unsigned int addr) { return Ram[addr]; }
44  // same as above but with writing
45  void wrtDMA(unsigned int addr, unsigned char value) { Ram[addr]=value; }
46  void setRamMask(unsigned int value) { RAMMask=value;}
47  unsigned int getRamMask(void) { return RAMMask;}
48  // are the ROMs disabled?
49  bool RAMenable;
50  // indicates whether 256K RAM is on
51  bool bigram, bramsm;
52  // /ram/rom path/load variables
53  void loadroms(void);
54  void loadloromfromfile(int nr, char fname[256]);
55  void loadhiromfromfile(int nr, char fname[256]);
56  char romlopath[4][256];
57  char romhighpath[4][256];
58  // this is for the FRE support
59  void dump(void *img);
60  void memin(void *img);
61  // screen rendering
62  // raster co-ordinates and boundaries
63  unsigned int beamx, beamy;
64  unsigned char screen[SCR_HSIZE*(SCR_VSIZE*2)];
65  bool render_ok;
66  void texttoscreen(int x,int y, const char *scrtxt);
67  void chrtoscreen(int x,int y, char scrchr);
68  // cursor stuff
69  unsigned int crsrpos;
70  int crsrphase;
71  bool crsrblinkon;
72  // is joy emulated?
73  bool joyemu;
74  // CPU class pointer
75  CPU *cpuptr;
76  // TED process (main loop of emulation)
77  void ted_process(unsigned int count);
78  void setDS( void *ds);
79 
80  unsigned char Ram[RAMSIZE];
81  unsigned char RomHi[4][ROMSIZE];
82  void ChangeMemBankSetup(bool romoff);
83 
84  // timer stuff
85  bool t1on, t2on, t3on;
86  unsigned int timer1, timer2, timer3, t1start;
87 
88  ClockCycle GetClockCount();
89  static TED *instance() { return instance_; };
90  void forcedReset();
91  // PSID support
92  void setMasterVolume(unsigned int shift);
93  void setSampleRate(unsigned int value);
94  void setFilterOrder(unsigned int value);
95  void initFilter(unsigned int sampleRate_, unsigned int filterOrder_);
96  unsigned int getSampleRate() { return sampleRate; };
97  void injectCodeToRAM(unsigned int address, unsigned char *from, size_t len);
98  void oscillatorInit();
99  void oscillatorReset();
100  void setPsidPlayAddress(unsigned int addr) { psidReplayAddr = addr; };
101  unsigned int getPsidPlayAddress() { return psidReplayAddr; };
102  void setPsid(bool isPsidFormat) { psidFormat = isPsidFormat; };
103  unsigned int isPsid() { return psidFormat; };
104  void selectWaveForm(unsigned int channel, unsigned int wave);
105  unsigned int getWaveForm(unsigned int channel) { return waveForm[channel]; }
106  void writeProtectedPlayerMemory(unsigned int addr, unsigned char *byte, unsigned int len) {
107  for(unsigned int i = 0; i < len; i++)
108  protectedPlayerMemory[(addr + i) & 0xfff] = *byte++;
109  }
110  void setplaybackSpeed(unsigned int speed);
111  void enableChannel(unsigned int channel, bool enable);
112  bool isChannelEnabled(unsigned int channel) {
113  return channelMask[channel % 3] != 0;
114  }
115  void storeToBuffer(short *buffer,unsigned int count = 1);
116  void copyToKbBuffer(char *bufferString, unsigned int bufferLength = -1);
117  unsigned int getTimeSinceLastReset();
118  void resetCycleCounter() { lastResetCycle = CycleCounter; }
119  SIDsound *getSidCard() { return sidCard; };
120  void enableSidCard(bool enable, unsigned int disableMask);
121  static unsigned int masterVolume;
122 
123  private:
124  static TED *instance_;
125  Filter *filter;
126  // memory variables
127  unsigned char RomLo[4][ROMSIZE];
128  unsigned char *actromlo, *actromhi;
129  unsigned char *mem_8000_bfff, *mem_c000_ffff, *mem_fc00_fcff;

136  bool scrblank;

138  unsigned int hshift, vshift;

141  unsigned char DMAbuf[64*3];
142  unsigned char *chrbuf, *clrbuf, *tmpClrbuf;
143  int cposy;

145  void (TED::*scrmode)();
